creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: white dress with scooped neckline, front and back, and short sleeves; sleeves and neckline trimmed with crochet; top section (front and back), under arms and front panel embroidered in bright multicolors with flowers and bluebirds; rows of figures above gathering at front and back
title: Dress
